description: This file defines the main navigation shell widget for a Flutter app, including tabbed navigation with role-based (admin/user) views, a sticky header, and a help floating action button.

classes.name: HomeShell
classes.description: Main widget serving as the role-based tabbed navigation shell with a pinned header and floating help button.

classes.name: _HomeShellState
classes.description: State class managing the tab controller and building the widget tree for HomeShell.

classes.name: _TabSpec
classes.description: Helper class for defining tab labels and icons.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for HomeShell widget.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the tab controller based on the user's admin status.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the UI with a nested scroll view, pinned app bar with tabs, tab views, and a help floating button.
